content: very vanilla socks plain basic very vanilla socks kbj designs ~ very vanilla socks © jo-anne klim 2010 very vanilla socks materials abbreviations madelinetosh tosh sock yarn approx approximately 100% merino 361m / 395yds per 115g cm centimetres colour wash 1 skein co cast on or approx 275m / 300yds of 4 ply fingering yarn dpn s double pointed needle s 1 set 2 25mm / us 1 dpns g grams 3 x stitch markers k knit tapestry needle k2tog knit 2 sts together m metres size p purl women s medium p2tog purl 2 sts together to fit foot circumference 20 cm / 8 in repeat s repeat s round s round s finished measurements rs right side sock circumference 19 cm / 7 5 in sl1 slip 1 st purlwise leg length 16 cm / 6 25 in ssk slip first st knitwise slip next st knitwise knit those two sts foot length 23 cm / 9 in together through the back loops st st stocking/stockinette stitch gauge st s stitch es 16 sts and 20 rnds = 5cm / 2in worked in st st using gauge gauge 2 25mm / us 1 needles or size required to obtain gauge ws wrong side check your gauge yds yards kbj designs ~ very vanilla socks 2 of 4 © jo-anne klim 2010 very vanilla socks pattern shape gusset hint the picked up sts will be tighter if knit through using 2 25mm needles cast on 60 sts and join the back loops on the next round only being careful not to twist place a marker for the next round k until 2 sts before the first gusset beginning of round marker k2tog slip marker k to second gusset marker slip marker ssk k to beginning of round marker 80 sts cuff round 1 k until 3 sts before first gusset marker k2tog rnds 1-25 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end k1 slip marker k until the second gusset marker slip marker k1 ssk k to beginning of round marker 78 sts leg round 2 k to end round 1 k to end repeat rnds 1 and 2 until 60 sts remain repeat round 1 until work measures approx 16 cm / 6 25 in from co foot round 1 k to end heel flap repeat round 1 until sock measures approx 19 cm / the heel flap is worked back and forth on half of the 7 5 in from back of heel - or until sock foot measures sts the remaining 30 sts will be worked later for the approx 4 cm / 1 5 in less than desired foot length instep row 1 rs *sl1 k1 repeat from * to end turn toe row 2 ws sl1 p to end turn round 1 k until 3 sts before first gusset marker k2tog repeat row 1 and 2 16 times 34 row in total k1 slip marker k1 ssk k until 3 sts before second gusset marker
